lore: Two hundred years ago, the dean of the Magic University of Neralim received a gift from one of her colleagues for Purple Victory Day. When she opened it, she was greeted by two dreadful rows of fangs and devoured in a single bite before she could react. The next morning her colleague was provisionally appointed as dean; a position she managed to keep for ten years, which at the time was the longest possible term of deanship, established to prevent such practices.
menagerieDialog: (It looks like a harmless chest, but you know better.)
(Honestly, it's not as clever as it thinks it is. The giant eyes, enormous tongue, and spiked teeth give away its attempts at secrecy.)
(It has so many teeth that you struggle to count them all. There are at least 12.)
HWAH HAH HAH HAH HAH! HWAAAAAAAAH! HA HA HA! SURPRIIIIIISE!\n\n(The novelty of this creature wore off incredibly fast.)
(You wonder what sort of consciousness is behind its vibrant gaze.)
name: Gift Mimic
